10.25.22  7:30 pm   how is the person in 'out to lunch' so good at pin-flipping?

      never heard of it

10.25.22  7:18 pm   how did the guy that went out to lunch balance the things on the thing so well?

      'fiction'

10.25.22  7:15 pm   Whats the first letter in the bible? I cant seem to remember

      there's different bibles

10.25.22  7:11 pm   what is your favorite cake flavor

      'baked'

10.25.22  7:11 pm   What did the guy in 'out to lunch' end up having for lunch?

      i'm not sure

10.25.22  7:10 pm   Have I been recently painted?

      i'm not sure

10.25.22  6:54 pm   about what time(s) do you answer questions?

      right now

10.25.22  6:54 pm   In out to lunch, where did he get his juggling skills?

      i don't know

10.25.22  6:49 pm   To you, which letter of the alphabet is objectively superior ?

      superior is a compare word. need another thing to compare it to. it's like getting high. you'd never actually know, unless there was something else around at a different height

10.25.22  6:46 pm   it's midnight. i'm going to lunch

      fair enough

10.25.22  6:36 pm   Plz can I see the script for out to lunch? I'm so curious to see how you planned them vs how they turned out.

      sure

10.25.22  6:34 pm   if you have a love/hate relationship with all music other than your own, what relationship do you have with your music?

      the same, but stronger

10.25.22  6:29 pm   what's your favorite ethical dilemma? 

      common sense

10.25.22  6:18 pm   did you pick a short script in order to have more time to work on the more complex animations such as the character pulling the thing, juggling the pins, the pin spinning on the light, and the character tossing the pins up on the other light?

      just about, except i was planning to keep it even shorter, more exclusively juggling. then i realized that my short list of every juggling trick wes peden has ever done is not exactly the most "attainable" strategy i should be shooting for. and neither is the 6+ minute wander/stunt binge i wrote just before this one. so after i realized that even something as simple as the 'columns' pattern is gonna break the juggling system i've got so far, i scrambled to write a brief wander and pray i wouldn't write it too long..... this is mostly accomplished by remembering not to go outside

10.25.22  6:13 pm   full sitcom when?

      as soon as they invent a laugh track that goes on forever, to keep me warm and safe

10.25.22  6:11 pm   how do you go to sleep

      impossible. it can't be done

10.25.22  6:06 pm   have you ever eaten lunch? have you ever contemplated lunch?

      that sounds vaguely familiar

10.25.22  6:05 pm   in Out To Lunch you animated a 3 club juggling pattern then chops. How do you know that trick??

      i did some basic research first

10.25.22  5:45 pm   what about dinner? when is it a perfect moment to go to dinner?

      after, before, or during, a win-win situation

10.25.22  5:32 pm   that moment in "out to lunch" when the protagonist places the ball in the cupboard handle is so perfect. I can't explain it but it really spoke to me. like of course it would go there, it's just so obvious. it felt right. there's no question exactly I'm just so appreciative of that little handle maneuver

      now you've got me wondering who the antagonist is

10.25.22  5:32 pm   thoughts on daylight savings?

      the daylight is not saved. it's just displaced

10.25.22  5:19 pm   Are the animations sans music because of a lack of inspiration for creating tunes or because of a desire for new creative direction?

      a chance to focus on my foley game, which, normally, has been completely lacking, probably because i'm quick to let music fill the void instead

10.25.22  5:12 pm   what did the script for out to lunch look like?

      this

10.25.22  5:05 pm   How did the character not realize his trick shots with the bats? He could totally be on Dude Perfect!

      must be murphy's law

10.25.22  5:02 pm   what building interior did you base the animation in your new video about (if any)

      i'll give you a hint. it's shaped like an octagon. but i realize this is not a very good hint because it is plainly obvious to be octagon shaped, on camera

10.25.22  4:49 pm   If there was somebody named gina what would she/ he/ they be like

      like all of us. all of us, deep down, are named gina

10.25.22  4:34 pm   Did you go to lunch after making "out to lunch"?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.25.22  4:32 pm   Thoughts on Wes anderson?

      compositions unfairly tasty

10.25.22  4:32 pm   Where did the person from "out to lunch" go for lunch?

      it appears to be a 3rd section of the activity room, which is supposed to be only separated from the other two sections by another fold out wall. However, due to time constraints, and also the expecation that that wall would never be shown on camera, i'm sad to admit that it is depicted as a normal wall

10.25.22  4:26 pm   i am very impressed with the juggling in your new video. how many years of experience do you have?

      with real juggling, only a few weeks, somewhere in childhood. in computer animation, only about 2 weeks

10.25.22  4:24 pm   Have you tried juggling before?

      yes

10.25.22  4:23 pm   does it say

teach dan smith
guitar
"someone's gotta do it"?

      yes

10.25.22  4:20 pm   hey, could you make your next video be the sequel to "out to lunch" called "in to lunch"?

      i was thinking maybe out to lunch the phantom menace

10.25.22  4:18 pm   where is your favorite place to go for lunch?

      directly into the public

10.25.22  4:17 pm   did you go out to lunch

      that sounds like something i would do

10.25.22  3:53 pm   Are you uploading on thursday's now?

     no

     Is there any reason why?

      thursday is too late. by then the week has already either been ruined or finished

10.25.22  2:45 pm   what do you use more, h264 or h265? any other that you use or prefer better?

     i really don't know a damn thing about either one. whatever gets the job done

     recently h266 came out
im excited but much of the platforms are not keeping pace, and i really need it for storage reasons

      well, in that case, consider it not fully out yet. but it will be. just like 5G, 4G, 3G, and everything all the way back to the typewriter. i remember when only Popes were allowed to use those

10.25.22  2:09 pm   can you make a song about trust

      sure

10.25.22  12:31 pm   Is there lore in your music video?

      sometimes

10.25.22  10:11 am   are these songs' lyrics basically what your thoughts are like?

      not quite. if it's lyrics, they are meant for music. check how it sounds in the song. that, is ideally supposed to be what i've felt. but that is only as good as my ability to translate that somehow into the physical world of audio resonation

10.25.22  6:24 am   How do you manage your sponges?

      i get the pre-managed sponges

10.25.22  3:14 am   I'm bored. Should I watch one of your old videos?

     sure

     If so, which one?

      how about the one that clamours for your attention and adoration

10.25.22  12:52 am   i often feel the people in my life would be better off without me, any advice on ways to try and shake that feeling? how do i make myself more valuable to the people i care about?

      think about who's valuable to you. see if you can catch a glimpse of this game from the other side

10.25.22  12:23 am   thoughts on junior murvin

      i've only heard the one about the hat. it's pretty good

10.24.22  11:50 pm   AM I YELLING?

      i doubt it

10.24.22  9:36 pm   why have you used the word "shoes" 8 times in your music?(from what data i can gather on the "lyrics" page) don't you think that's far too much?

      what about you..... is it possible that you've used it too FEW times?

10.24.22  8:44 pm   Opinion on Bad Things

      they seem pretty good

10.24.22  8:14 pm   in "two friends on the beach", why did the waiter serve corn right on the table? shouldn't he serve it on, like, a plate or some sort, since it's basic restaurant manners?

      yes, but the point of this move is to instantly jump from the moment where the waiter is explaining what they have, to actually giving it to them. I think i realized the plate debacle somewhere in pre-production, and it was troubling to me too, because i was imagining the backfork person pushing them around a plate. But after thinking long and hard about it, i realized there is no way to deliver corn in a surprising manner like that, with plates. And also, i decided it would be inappropriate to have the table start with empty plates. It turns out, i was in for a nice surprise when i found out that the table cloths have a plaid square pattern on them, which is a perfect sort of game board to play with, pushing corn around

10.24.22  8:13 pm   as a montanan, I object to your answer about the montana question on the 19th. my objection is that now everyone will start coming to montana to look for my buried treasure

      don't worry, most people don't even know where montana is. and if they came there, you'd still never find them, and they'd never find the treasure, and then after they left you wouldn't even know they left because you couldn't find them when they were there

10.24.22  5:38 pm   what is your favorite animal?

      it's a toss up between a duck and a truck
